FAQ.title: FAQ & Myths
FAQ.subtitle: Everything you need to know about SEO and website building.

items.question: Why a website? Isn't IG/FB enough?
items.answer: Social platforms are like renting. The landlord (algorithm) can raise rent or evict you. Owning a website is buying a house; you have full control and asset value compounds over time.

items.question: Static sites have no interaction?
items.answer: Modern sites aren't static. We use Next.js to make websites feel as fast and fluid as Apps. Speed is money; every millisecond of delay loses customers.

items.question: What is SEO?
items.answer: SEO is translating your business language into machine language. We let Google understand your value so customers find you first.

items.question: What is GEO?
items.answer: GEO (Generative Engine Optimization) optimizes for AI like ChatGPT. Future search won't give 10 links, but 1 standard answer. We ensure your brand is that answer.

items.question: Can't I just use ChatGPT to write content?
items.answer: AI can write words but lacks strategy and structured data. We build the underlying architecture that Google and AI can read, not just pile up text.

items.question: Will I get traffic immediately?
items.answer: SEO is planting a tree; Ads are buying flowers. Trees take time (3-6 months) but shade you forever; flowers fade in 3 days.
